lootbagmod.midnightconfig.title: Loot Bag Mod
lootbagmod.midnightconfig.option.StackSi: Maximum possible stack size for dropped items
lootbagmod.midnightconfig.option.Drops: How many items drop when a loot bag is used
lootbagmod.midnightconfig.option.EnableW: Use Whitelist (if enabled only items from lists below are dropped; otherwise all items except them)
lootbagmod.midnightconfig.option.BlackLi: BlackList (Syntax "minecraft or modid : item or block name"; example "minecraft:air" or "lootbagmod:lootbag")
lootbagmod.midnightconfig.option.WhiteLi: WhiteList Syntax "minecraft or modid : item or block name"; example minecraft:air or lootbagmod:lootbag)
lootbagmod.midnightconfig.option.ChestDr: Loot Bags spawns in treasure chests
lootbagmod.midnightconfig.option.ChestsL: List of chests in which Loot Bag can spawn (Syntax "minecraft or modid : chests / chest id; example "minecraft:chests/jungle_temple"
lootbagmod.midnightconfig.option.MobDrop: Loot Bags drops from killed mobs
lootbagmod.midnightconfig.option.DropCha: Loot Bag drop chance from mobs (the higher the number the more common they are)
lootbagmod.midnightconfig.option.AllHost: Make Loot Bags droppable from all hostile Mobs
lootbagmod.midnightconfig.option.AllNonH: Make Loot Bags droppable from all passive and neutral mobs
lootbagmod.midnightconfig.option.MobList: Mob drops list (Syntax " minecraft or modname : mobregistryname ")
